Related repos

  • GenAI agent tutorials and code for building and experimenting with different AI agent techniques
  • infrastructure for running and managing GenAI agents with backend, frontend, and protocol support
  • Collection of 130 Gen AI apps and agents
  • Python library for Google’s Gemini AI models
  • A framework for building event-driven GenAI applications
  • Integrates enterprise search into AI agents
  • GenAI framework prioritizing control over abstraction
  • Production-ready GenAI agent templates for Google Cloud with deployment, CLI, and monitoring tools
  • AI agent workflows for automation platform
  • Notebooks and code samples for building generative AI apps on Google Cloud
